title: Enakhe
synopsis: Set in modern-day Benin city, Enakhe tells the story of Epa Iwinosa, father of the Eponymous character and the leader of "the association of friends" also known as "the table", a small brotherhood that rules the underworld in Benin. Epa moved to crime after his friend's child died due to a lack of funds. It also tells the story of Enakhe who is kind, unassuming and ignorant of her father's dealings. Enakhe is unfit for a life of crime but in spite of this, she is destined to rule after Epa who is unexpectedly killed. Enakhe grows to know about her father's dealings and is forced out of her shell to embrace her father's ruthlessness and fearlessness.

title: Mr and Mrs A
synopsis: Meet Jite and Oge Akpofure, a newly wedded couple who are finding out that Forever takes some hard work right now. With their crazily in love friends and their siblings, they go on a journey towards happiness, love and the marriage of their dreams.

title: A Naija Christmas
synopsis: Determined to carry out their mother's one wish, three men scramble to find wives they can bring home by Christmas. Meanwhile, their mum sets out to plan the most beautiful Christmas celebration ever.

title: E.V.E (Season 3)
synopsis: Years after Ezinne and Peter started EE & A, they tackle a high-profile murder case. An emotionally fragile Ugo attends therapy and Mama Ugo longs for her family.

title: Far From Home
synopsis: A troubled teenager finds himself in the world of luxury after winning a prestigious scholarship to an exclusive school. As he attempts to navigate this new world, the teenagers continues to aim for the top.

title: Collision Course
synopsis: The lives of an aspiring musician and a struggling police officer come crashing into each other in a powerful story about how one day can change everything.

title: Obara'm
synopsis: Confronted by her past, promising musician Oluchi tries to reconcile with the daughter she abandoned. However, some things cannot be forgiven.

title: Finding Diana
production: Up In The Sky, Paradigm Iniatiative
synopsis: Aisha Coker, a 28-year-old down-on-her-luck journalist chasing a story about debauchery in the ranks of her state government. Aisha quit being any kind of hero for any cause of justice – her days of wanting to make the world a better place are behind her. Her goals now are fame and recognition – and she believes this story will put her on the map. What follows is a dive into the underbelly of a conspiracy threatening to consume her soul. What would she unravel

title: Cloud 9
synopsis: A final year student has to face unexpected consequences after he offers unorthodox help to his roommate

title: Shanty Town
synopsis: A group of courtesans attempts to escape the grasp of a notorious kingpin- but political corruption and blood ties make freedom a near-impossible goal.

title: Over the Bridge
synopsis: Over The Bridge tells a story of a man's journey while grappling with his emotional state and the quest to rediscover purpose in the midst of the internal and external pressures he is facing.

title: Ebuka Turns Up Africa
synopsis: Ebuka Turns Up Africa is a captivating showcase of camaraderie and adventure, as Ebuka undertakes the journey of a lifetime with his guys: Timini Egbuson, Zubby Michael, Jimmie Akinsola, Onoja Adole, and Alistair Englebert Preston. Together, they embark on an unforgettable VIP adventure across Africa, in a compelling series that not only transcends borders, but reveals the men behind their celebrity personas. As all-star cast ignites their spirit of exploration, personalities clash and tempers flare in a journey across the continent that isn’t always smooth sailing

title: Africa Magic @20
synopsis: A documentary series celebrating Africa Magic at 20

title: My Fairytale Wedding
synopsis: Moji's desperate search for true love leads her to seek mystical services, but she soon discovers the costly consequences of her desires.

title: Princess on a Hill
synopsis: Zara, the naive protege and winner of a reality show, makes her debut in the most powerful boardroom in the country. She must save the company from decline while resisting the dark influence of the enigmatic tyrant pulling her strings.

title: DSTV Festive
synopsis: Your Reasons to be Haappy

title: Milo Testimonials 2024
synopsis: Series of Testimonials by coaches on the players

title: To Kill a Monkey
synopsis: Efemini, a down-on-his-luck everyman whose life changes forever after a chance meeting with an old friend. Forced by circumstance to suppress his principles and explore a life of cybercrime, he finds himself making ever-greater moral compromises to stay ahead of the consequences of his new choices... and broadening tastes.

title: Bam Bam
synopsis: Babatunde is a gifted but awkward teenager caught in the middle of his parents’ divorce. When he falls for a girl in his class, he turns to Bam Bam, his AI friend who seems to have all the answers. but the closer he gets to love, the more he must choose between connection and the doubts that have always controlled him.

title: Whispers in the Wires
production: Up In The Sky, Paradigm Iniatiative
synopsis: A retired nurse and thrift collector accidentally uploads an emotional video for her son to social media and finds the responsibility of fighting misinformation in her community after mistakenly getting famous.

title: Tales of Ramadan
synopsis: Tales of Ramadan is a collection of stories that deal with everything from family troubles to friendship rivalries to student struggles and so much more! The power of connecting over meals made with love is at the heart of each tale, so we can all relate!
